name: The Last Seed Greeny Jam 2022
description:
This is a platformer game that created for Greeny Jam 2022

There is a robot called Greeny. He lives in post apocalyptic world and there is no green in their life except him. His color is green so, he discriminated by other robots in his whole life. He has no friend or no relationship. He lives in the desert.  One day he find a scroll in desert. He never know that scroll will change his life.

Game is not finished and have many bugs in game it is still in development.

## Controls:

- **Movement**: W A S D

- **Pause** : Esc

- **Atack** : E

- **Skip Level** : M

- **Last Levell** : N

- **Refresh Level** :
